mapper.insert: insert into fa_visit (url, referer, create_time, ip, num) values (#{url}, #{referer}, #{createTime, javaType=DATE}, #{ip}, 1)
mapper.select: select count(num) from fa_visit where url = #{url} and create_time = curdate() and ip = #{ip}
mapper.update: update fa_visit set num = num+1 where url = #{url} and create_time = curdate() and ip = #{ip}
mapper.select: select count(ip) from (select count(ip) as ip from fa_visit group by ip) visit
